title: Tell Us About Your Experience with the Living HHS Open Data Plan
description:
This form is a voluntary request for public inputs and/or comments on the Living HHS Open Data Plan, published by the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) version 1.0 in July 2025.

It is an open-ended, free response sheet for you to share feedback, ideas, and/or suggestions with HHS—and the public— on the Living HHS Open Data Plan. All submissions will be open for public users to read online, so please adhere to the HHS Code of Conduct. The below prompt is followed by the table of contents with open-ended response fields if you would like to submit comment to a specific section of the Living HHS Open Data Plan.

Living HHS Open Data Plan — Feedback to HHS

Please let HHS know of other emerging trends, technologies, and priorities with public benefit that are missing and should be featured in the Living HHS Open Data Plan.

List any improvements to processes for meeting Open Data goals, intra-HHS data sharing, and Real-World data exchanges to best serve you, U.S. health, and human services.

If missing from version 1.0, please let HHS know what additional partnerships, collaborations, or public engagements fueled by HHS Open Data should be featured or referenced in future iterations of the Living HHS Open Data Plan.

New data governance will be required, so please share your ideas or favorite examples on how HHS should pilot new data governance models with patients, industry, and all sectors, or otherwise improve health data governance.

Please let HHS know if any discussion topics or other issues (e.g. data assets, data collection processes, data governance, data usage, completed or on-going project, etc.) are missing and should be featured in the Living HHS Open Data Plan.

enum: HHS Objectives, Values, and Return on Investment (ROI) with Data

Improving Processes for Meeting Open Data Goals
Intra-HHS Data Sharing — Be the Change

Appendix D - HHS Partnerships with Transparency

Appendix F – HHS Data Improvement Process – 2025 Status
